description:
It is the embarrassing flub that has seen him become a nationwide figure of fun.约翰·特拉沃尔塔在这次奥斯卡上犯了一个很尴尬的失误，成为人们的笑谈。

And now John Travolta has publicly apologised for mangling Idina Menzel's name when he introduced her at the Oscars.如今约翰·特拉沃尔塔正式公开致歉伊迪娜·门泽尔，因为他在奥斯卡颁奖典礼上念错了她的名字。

The Look Who's Talking star admitted he was putting himself through the wringer after accidentally calling her 'Adele Dazeem,' before ultimately deciding to clear his conscience.约翰·特拉沃尔塔表示，他在不小心把“伊迪娜·门泽尔”读成“阿黛尔·戴齐姆”之后感觉很是愧疚难过，于是最后确定公开道歉以求无愧于心。

Twitter was abuzz after he made the embarrassing gaffe before her performance of Frozen's Let It Go, which won the Academy Award for best original song.当时约翰话音刚落，推特上早已炸开了锅，而这时伊迪娜还尚未开始表演《Let It Go》。

In a statement the 60-year-old said: 'I've been beating myself up all day. 'Then I thought, what would Idina Menzel say? She'd say, let it go, let it go!'这位60岁的影帝道歉说：“我竟然念错了名字！为此我一整天都在自责。然后我就在想伊迪娜会说什么？她应该会说：‘让它过去吧！让它过去吧！’”

'Idina is incredibly talented and I am so happy Frozen took home two Oscars Sunday night!'“伊迪娜是一个很有天赋的歌手，我为《冰雪奇缘》能获得奥斯卡的两个奖项而高兴。”

And it seems that despite his embarrassing mistake in front of 43 million people, there are no hard feelings.虽然约翰在4300万人面前犯了一个如此尴尬的错误，但这似乎没造成什么很严重的后果。

A source told People that far from being annoyed by the error, the 42-year-old Broadway star 'thought it was funny.'有消息称伊迪娜并没有对此觉得恼怒，还觉得这很有趣。

Social media went into overdrive on Sunday after John said: 'The Oscar-nominated gorgeously empowering song Let It Go from the Oscar-winning animated movie Frozen, please welcome the wickedly talented one and only Adele Dazeem.'社交媒体也忙着点评约翰的错误，他的原话是：“《冰雪奇缘》的插曲《Let It Go》获得了本届奥斯卡的最佳原创歌曲提名，现在让我们热烈欢迎独一无二、超具天赋阿黛尔·戴齐姆为我们演唱！”

Despite the mispronunciation, it didn't seem to affect the 42-year-old star, who put in a scintillating performance of the song.尽管名字被读错了，但是这并没有影响到伊迪娜的发挥，她在现场完美地完成了演唱。
